articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: US Bombers HIT Chinese Embassy: Israel’s Attack On Iranian Consulate Reminds Of Tragic 1999 Incident - EurAsian Times
articles.description: In what appears to be an unprecedented escalation, the Israel Air Force (IAF) fighter jets reportedly bombed Iran’s embassy in Syria on April 1, killing several high-ranking officials. The incident has left the Iranian establishment fuming as the airstrike ki…
articles.content:
